home.title: AI-Powered Health Analysis for Indians
home.subtitle: Upload your blood reports and get instant AI analysis with personalized recommendations tailored to Indian dietary habits, lifestyle, and ayurvedic principles.
home.whyChooseSubtitle: Our AI understands Indian health patterns, dietary preferences, and lifestyle factors to provide you with the most relevant health insights.
home.instantAnalysisDesc: Get comprehensive health insights in seconds, not days. Our AI processes your reports instantly.
home.indianSpecificDesc: Recommendations based on Indian dietary habits, regional foods, and traditional wellness practices.
home.privacyFirstDesc: Your health data is processed securely and never stored. Complete privacy guaranteed.
home.readyToTakeControl: Ready to Take Control of Your Health?
home.readySubtitle: Join thousands of Indians who trust PranaCare for AI-powered health insights. Upload your blood report and get instant analysis - completely free!

tryApp.title: Try PranaCare AI
tryApp.subtitle: Upload your blood report and get instant AI-powered health analysis with personalized recommendations for Indians.
tryApp.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, and other image formats. Maximum file size: 10MB
tryApp.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your file here
tryApp.uploadingDesc: Please wait while we process your file.
tryApp.analyzingDesc: Our AI is extracting insights and generating personalized recommendations.
tryApp.analysisCompleteDesc: Your blood report has been successfully analyzed. Here are your personalized health insights:
tryApp.analysisFailedDesc: Something went wrong while analyzing your report.

contact.title: Contact PranaCare
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you on your health journey. Reach out to us for any questions, feedback, or support regarding your AI-powered health analysis.
contact.faqFreeAnswer: Yes, PranaCare is completely free to use. We believe everyone should have access to AI-powered health insights without any cost barriers.
contact.faqSecurity: How secure is my health data?
contact.faqSecurityAnswer: Your privacy is our top priority. We process your health reports locally and never store them on our servers. All data is encrypted and deleted immediately after analysis.
contact.faqTrust: Can I trust the AI recommendations?
contact.faqTrustAnswer: Our AI provides educational insights based on medical knowledge and Indian health patterns. However, these are not medical diagnoses. Always consult qualified healthcare providers for medical decisions.

doctors.title: Find Doctors
doctors.subtitle: Connect with certified doctors for personalized consultations based on your health analysis.

doctorSignup.title: Join PranaCare as a Doctor
doctorSignup.subtitle: Help patients with AI-powered health insights and provide consultations to those who need medical guidance.
doctorSignup.aboutPlaceholder: Tell patients about your experience, approach to healthcare, and areas of expertise...
doctorSignup.termsAndConditions: I agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
doctorSignup.applicationSubmittedDesc: We will review your application and contact you within 2-3 business days.
